original_title: Zu hören auf hören (Von steirischen Musikanten)
overview: Scenes from the life of eight Styrian musicians; a collage which is intensified through super-8 images, polaroid photographs, the sound track which includes text citations; not much folk music, much context, sounds of everyday life, work and agricultural machines.
title: Zu hören auf hören (Von steirischen Musikanten)
